Uses of Class
ch.aplu.nxtsim.TurtleRobot

    • Uses of TurtleRobot in ch.aplu.nxtsim

      Methods in ch.aplu.nxtsim that return TurtleRobot 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TurtleRobot TurtleRobot.backward()
      Starts moving backward and returns immediately.
      TurtleRobot TurtleRobot.backward(int steps)
      Moves the turtle backward the given number of steps.
      TurtleRobot TurtleRobot.forward()
      Starts moving forward and returns immediately.
      TurtleRobot TurtleRobot.forward(int steps)
      Moves the turtle forward the given number of steps.
      TurtleRobot TurtleRobot.left()
      Starts turning left and returns immediately.
      TurtleRobot TurtleRobot.left(double angle)
      Turns the left to the right for the given angle.
      TurtleRobot TurtleRobot.right()
      Starts turning right and returns immediately.
      TurtleRobot TurtleRobot.right(double angle)
      Turns the turtle to the right for the given angle.
      TurtleRobot TurtleRobot.setTurtleSpeed(int speed)
      Sets the turtle speed to the given value.
